After download, unzip the data folder and place it somewhere you can find it again. Read the section below about file structure for recommendations on this.

## File structure

Make a project folder. Inside this, make a script and a data folder. Save the downloaded data in the data folder and save your scripts (Quarto documents) in the scripts folder.
